node.title: 'I refuse to believe': Brazilian singer's death in plane crash met with shock
node.description: Marília Mendonça dies in a plane crash on her way to a concert, triggering an outpouring of sadness and shock on social media from Brazilian sport stars, fans and politicians.
node.content: ["Mar\u00edlia Mendon\u00e7a, one of Brazil's most popular singers, has died in a plane crash on her way to a concert.", "The 26-year-old's press office confirmed her death in a statement, and said four other passengers on the flight also died.", "Their plane crashed between Mendon\u00e7a's hometown Goiania and Caratinga, a small city in Minas Gerais state located north of Rio de Janeiro.", "Minas Gerais state's civil police also confirmed Mendon\u00e7a's death, without providing details about the cause of the accident, which occurred shortly before the plane was due to land.", "Photographs and videos showed the plane lying just beneath a waterfall.", "Mendon\u00e7a had posted a video that afternoon showing her walking toward the plane, guitar case in hand.", "The rising star performed country music, in Brazil called sertanejo. She was known for tackling feminist issues in her songs, such as denouncing men who control their partners, and calling for female empowerment.", "The news triggered an outpouring of sadness on social media from all corners of Brazil, including fans, politicians, musicians and footballers. Her Instagram account has 38 million followers.", "Brazil's government also offered its condolences.", "President Jair Bolsonaro used social media to mourn the passing \"of one of the greatest artists of her generation.\"", "\"The entire country receives the news in shock,\" he said.", "Mendon\u00e7a's Em Todos os Cantos (Everywhere) album\u00a0won her the 2019 Latin Grammy for best sertanejo album. She was nominated for the same award this year for her album Patroas (Mistresses).", "Mendon\u00e7a was also famous for her romantic songs, often expressing the loss of loved ones.", "\"You always make me cry, you're unique and eternal,\" one fan, Michelle Wisla, wrote on Twitter.", "Mendon\u00e7a leaves behind a son, who will turn 2 years old next month.", "AP"]
